quote: Every story has an end, but in life every ending is just a new beginning.
author: Life

quote: Never stop learning, because life never stops teaching.
author: Life

quote: Kill tension before tensions kill you, reach your goal before goal kicks you, live life before life leaves you.
author: Life

quote: Life ends when you stop dreaming, hope ends when you stop believing and love ends when you stop caring. So dream hope and love ...Makes Life Beautiful!!!!
author: Life

quote: Man that is born of woman hath but a short time to live, and is full of misery. He comet up, and is cut down, like a flower; he fleeth as it were a shadow, and never continueth in one stay.
author: Book Of Common Prayer

quote: You have to fight through some bad days to earn the best days of your life.
author: Author

quote: No one said life would be easy, they just promised it would get better.
author: Life

quote: May God bless you to live as long as you want to; and want to as long as you live!
author: Scottish Proverbs

quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Life is like making tea! Boil your ego, Evaporate your worries, Dilute your sorrows, Filter your mistakes & Get Taste of Happiness. :)
author: Life

quote: Sometimes, it only takes one person to change your life. One to be there for you, to push you, to believe in you. It only takes one.
author: Author

quote: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: In life we all have an unspeakable secret ,an irreversible regret , an unreachable dream and an unforgettable love!!!
author: Life

quote: One of the processes of your life is to constantly break down that inferiority, to constantly reaffirm that I Am Somebody.
author: Alvin Ailey

quote: Television is not real life. In real life people actually have to leave the coffee shop and go to jobs.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Life is not fair; get used to it.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Dont trust too much, dont hope too much because that too much? can hurt you so much.
author: Life

quote: Always choose the right path and speak the truth.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Freedom is never dear at any price. It is the breath of life. What would a man not pay for living?
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Nothing in life is so exhilarating as to be shot at without result.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: It matters not how long you live, but how well.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: Life is one long process of getting tired.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Life has taught me to think, but thinking has not taught me to live.
author: Alexander Herzen

quote: Life rests on the pillar of love, care & trust. Have a strong pillar to have a beautiful life.
author: Life

quote: Strange is our situation here upon earth. Each of us comes for a short visit, not knowing why, yet sometimes seeming to divine a purpose. From the standpoint of daily life, however, there is one thing we do know: that man is here for the sake of other men-above all for those upon whose smile and well-being our own happiness depends, and also for the countless unknown souls with whose fate we are connected by a bond of sympathy. Many times a day I realize how much my own outer and inner life is built upon the labors of my fellow men, both living and dead, and how earnestly I must exert myself in order to give in return as much as I have received. My peace of mind is often troubled by the depressing sense that I have borrowed too heavily from the work of other men.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: That awkward moment between birth and death is life.
author: Life

quote: Every silence is a sin of zero balance!
author: Life

quote: Never forget yesterday, But always live for today... Cuz you never know what tomorrow can bring, Or what it can take away...
author: Life

quote: Life is really simple, but men insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: It is a useless life that is not consecrated to a great ideal. It is like a stone wasted on the field without becoming a part of any edifice.
author: Jose Rizal

quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of life has not discovered the value of life.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: The sole meaning of life is to serve humanity.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life; define yourself.
author: Harvey Fierstein

quote: A good life is a collection of happy moments.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: I regret nothing in my life even if my past was full of hurt, I still look back and smile, because it made me who I am today.
author: Author

quote: Life is the most difficult exam. Many people fail bcoz they try to copy others, not realising that everyone has a different question paper.
author: Life

quote: Life is not a dress rehearsal.
author: Rose Tremain

quote: Intellectual property has the shelf life of a banana.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Success always hugs you in private but failure always slaps you in the public ! thats life.
author: Life

quote: Our life is shaped by our mind; we become what we think.
author: Gautama Buddha

quote: Everything in life is temporary. So if things are good, enjoy it because it wont last forever. And if things are going bad, dont worry. It cant last forever either.
author: Life

quote: Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in long-shot.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: The Christian life is not a constant high. I have my moments of deep discouragement. I have to go to God in prayer with tears in my eyes, and say, 'O God, forgive me,' or 'Help me.'
author: Billy Graham

quote: Life is like Adidas and Nike, Nothing is impossible so Just Do It.
author: Life

quote: America is the land of the second chance - and when the gates of the prison open, the path ahead should lead to a better life.
author: George W. Bush

quote: Concision in style, precision in thought, decision in life.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Life is so beautiful that death has fallen in love with it, a jealous, possessive love that grabs at what it can. But life leaps over oblivion lightly, losing only a thing or two of no importance, and gloom is but the passing shadow of a cloud...
author: Yann Martel

quote: Man is not the creature of circumstances, circumstances are the creatures of man. We are free agents, and man is more powerful than matter.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Live your life as though your every act were to become a universal law.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: Life is divided into three terms - that which was, which is, and which will be. Let us learn from the past to profit by the present, and from the present to live better in the future.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: It is a law of life that problems arise when conditions are there for their solution.
author: Walter Sisulu

quote: Variety's the very spice of life, That gives it all its flavor.
author: William Cowper

quote: I must have done something right to deserve you in my life.
author: Author

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle, In order to keep your balance you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: We need to give each other the space to grow, to be ourselves, to exercise our diversity. We need to give each other space so that we may both give and receive such beautiful things as ideas, openness, dignity, joy, healing, and inclusion.
author: Max de Pree

quote: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.
author: Sai Baba

quote: Life is 10 percent what you make it, and 90 percent how you take it.
author: Irving Berlin

quote: Sometimes we struggle through a tasteless coffee till the last sip,then we find sugar lying at the bottom .. thats life, sweetened but not stirred well.
author: Life

quote: No sympathy for the devil; keep that in mind. Buy the ticket, take the ride...and if it occasionally gets a little heavier than what you had in mind, well...maybe chalk it off to forced conscious expansion: Tune in, freak out, get beaten.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Life is not a spectator sport. If you're going to spend your whole life in the grandstand just watching what goes on, in my opinion you're wasting your life.
author: Jackie Robinson

quote: Life is full of misery, loneliness, and suffering - and it's all over much too soon.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Life is what happens to you while youre busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: Once she stopped rushing through life, she was amazed how much more life she had time for.
author: Author

quote: It is not uncommon for people to spend their whole life waiting to start living.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: The game of life is a game of boomerangs. Our thoughts, deeds and words return to us sooner or later with astounding accuracy.
author: Florence Scovel Shinn

quote: If everything is important, then nothing is.
author: Patrick Lencioni

quote: The sun is somewhere shining even when it rains.
author: Life

quote: My life has no purpose, no direction, no aim, no meaning, and yet I'm happy. I can't figure it out. What am I doing right?
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Opportunities to find deeper powers within ourselves come when life seems most challenging.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
author: Marie Curie

quote: Be thankful for hard times in your life. Try not to look at them as bad things, but as opportunities to grow and learn.
author: Life

quote: I know life was never meant to be easy.. but i never thought it would be this hard.
author: Life

quote: Semua perjalanan hidup adalah sinema. Bahkan lebih mengerikan. Darah adalah darah, dan tangis adalah tangis. Tak ada pemeran pengganti yang akan menanggung sakitmu.
author: Dee

quote: Most people are too busy living life to ever put life in their living.
author: Doug Firebaugh

quote: Every single thing that has ever happened in your life is preparing you for a moment that is yet to come.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: May you live all the days of your life.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: In poverty and other misfortunes of life, true friends are a sure refuge. The young they keep out of mischief; to the old they are a comfort and aid in their weakness, and those in the prime of life they incite to noble deeds.
author: Aristotle

quote: Always tell someone how you feel, because opportunities are lost in the blink of an eye but regret can last for a lifetime.
author: Author

quote: Existence really is an imperfect tense that never becomes a present.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Order your soul; reduce your wants; live in charity; associate in Christian community; obey the laws; trust in Providence.
author: Saint Augustine of Hippo

quote: A man who views the world the same at fifty as he did at twenty has wasted thirty years of his life.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Nothing in life and nothing that we do is risk-free.
author: Ken Salazar

quote: All things share the same breath - the beast, the tree, the man... the air shares its spirit with all the life it supports.
author: Chief Seattle

quote: He who is not busy being born is busy dying.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Life is hard; it's harder if you're stupid.
author: John Wayne

quote: Clothes mean nothing until someone lives in them.
author: Marc Jacobs

quote: Never regret yesterday. Life is in you today and you make your tomorrow.
author: L. Ron Hubbard

quote: We spend most of our lives conjugating three verbs: to want, to have, and to do.
author: Evelyn Underhill

quote: Think naught a trifle, though it small appear; Small stands the mountain, moments make the year, and trifles life.
author: Edward Young

quote: Life must be lived forwards, but can only be understood backwards.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: A ship should not ride on a single anchor, nor life on a single hope.
author: Epictetus

quote: My friends have made the story of my life. In a thousand ways they have turned my limitations into beautiful privileges, and enabled me to walk serene and happy in the shadow cast by my deprivation.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Life is about laughing & living, in good & bad times. Getting through whatever comes our way & looking back & smiling.
author: Life

quote: If you just keep your head down and just try and do your thing, sometimes magic happens.
author: Gavin Rossdale

quote: The shoe that fits one person pinches another; there is no recipe for living that suits all cases.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Every smile is a sign of daily brushing!
author: Life

quote: How far you go in life depends on your being tender with the young, compassionate with the aged, sympathetic with the striving and tolerant of the weak and strong. Because someday in your life you will have been all of these.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: Life is pain, highness. Anyone who says differently is selling something.
author: William Goldman

quote: The quality of a person's life is in direct proportion to their commitment to excellence, regardless of their chosen field of endeavor.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Life isnt about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: Life

quote: It is a law of life that problems arise when conditions are there for their solution.
author: Walter Sisulu

quote: Variety's the very spice of life, That gives it all its flavor.
author: William Cowper

quote: I must have done something right to deserve you in my life.
author: Author

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle, In order to keep your balance you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: We spend most of our lives conjugating three verbs: to want, to have, and to do.
author: Evelyn Underhill

quote: Think naught a trifle, though it small appear; Small stands the mountain, moments make the year, and trifles life.
author: Edward Young

quote: Life must be lived forwards, but can only be understood backwards.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: A ship should not ride on a single anchor, nor life on a single hope.
author: Epictetus

quote: My friends have made the story of my life. In a thousand ways they have turned my limitations into beautiful privileges, and enabled me to walk serene and happy in the shadow cast by my deprivation.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Life is about laughing & living, in good & bad times. Getting through whatever comes our way & looking back & smiling.
author: Life

quote: If you just keep your head down and just try and do your thing, sometimes magic happens.
author: Gavin Rossdale

quote: The shoe that fits one person pinches another; there is no recipe for living that suits all cases.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Every smile is a sign of daily brushing!
author: Life

quote: How far you go in life depends on your being tender with the young, compassionate with the aged, sympathetic with the striving and tolerant of the weak and strong. Because someday in your life you will have been all of these.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: Life is pain, highness. Anyone who says differently is selling something.
author: William Goldman

quote: The quality of a person's life is in direct proportion to their commitment to excellence, regardless of their chosen field of endeavor.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Life isnt about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: Life

quote: It is a law of life that problems arise when conditions are there for their solution.
author: Walter Sisulu

quote: Variety's the very spice of life, That gives it all its flavor.
author: William Cowper

quote: I must have done something right to deserve you in my life.
author: Author

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle, In order to keep your balance you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: We need to give each other the space to grow, to be ourselves, to exercise our diversity. We need to give each other space so that we may both give and receive such beautiful things as ideas, openness, dignity, joy, healing, and inclusion.
author: Max de Pree

quote: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.
author: Sai Baba

quote: Life is 10 percent what you make it, and 90 percent how you take it.
author: Irving Berlin

quote: Sometimes we struggle through a tasteless coffee till the last sip,then we find sugar lying at the bottom .. thats life, sweetened but not stirred well.
author: Life

quote: No sympathy for the devil; keep that in mind. Buy the ticket, take the ride...and if it occasionally gets a little heavier than what you had in mind, well...maybe chalk it off to forced conscious expansion: Tune in, freak out, get beaten.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Life is not a spectator sport. If you're going to spend your whole life in the grandstand just watching what goes on, in my opinion you're wasting your life.
author: Jackie Robinson

quote: Life is full of misery, loneliness, and suffering - and it's all over much too soon.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Life is what happens to you while youre busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: Once she stopped rushing through life, she was amazed how much more life she had time for.
author: Author

quote: It is not uncommon for people to spend their whole life waiting to start living.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: The game of life is a game of boomerangs. Our thoughts, deeds and words return to us sooner or later with astounding accuracy.
author: Florence Scovel Shinn

quote: If everything is important, then nothing is.
author: Patrick Lencioni

quote: The sun is somewhere shining even when it rains.
author: Life

quote: My life has no purpose, no direction, no aim, no meaning, and yet I'm happy. I can't figure it out. What am I doing right?
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Opportunities to find deeper powers within ourselves come when life seems most challenging.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
author: Marie Curie

quote: Be thankful for hard times in your life. Try not to look at them as bad things, but as opportunities to grow and learn.
author: Life

quote: I know life was never meant to be easy.. but i never thought it would be this hard.
author: Life

quote: Semua perjalanan hidup adalah sinema. Bahkan lebih mengerikan. Darah adalah darah, dan tangis adalah tangis. Tak ada pemeran pengganti yang akan menanggung sakitmu.
author: Dee

quote: Most people are too busy living life to ever put life in their living.
author: Doug Firebaugh

quote: Every single thing that has ever happened in your life is preparing you for a moment that is yet to come.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: May you live all the days of your life.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: In poverty and other misfortunes of life, true friends are a sure refuge. The young they keep out of mischief; to the old they are a comfort and aid in their weakness, and those in the prime of life they incite to noble deeds.
author: Aristotle

quote: Always tell someone how you feel, because opportunities are lost in the blink of an eye but regret can last for a lifetime.
author: Author

quote: Existence really is an imperfect tense that never becomes a present.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Order your soul; reduce your wants; live in charity; associate in Christian community; obey the laws; trust in Providence.
author: Saint Augustine of Hippo

quote: A man who views the world the same at fifty as he did at twenty has wasted thirty years of his life.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Nothing in life and nothing that we do is risk-free.
author: Ken Salazar

quote: All things share the same breath - the beast, the tree, the man... the air shares its spirit with all the life it supports.
author: Chief Seattle

quote: He who is not busy being born is busy dying.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Life is hard; it's harder if you're stupid.
author: John Wayne

quote: Clothes mean nothing until someone lives in them.
author: Marc Jacobs

quote: Never regret yesterday. Life is in you today and you make your tomorrow.
author: L. Ron Hubbard

quote: We spend most of our lives conjugating three verbs: to want, to have, and to do.
author: Evelyn Underhill

quote: Think naught a trifle, though it small appear; Small stands the mountain, moments make the year, and trifles life.
author: Edward Young

author: Life

author: Carl Jung
